Library.Definition.Name: Default templates for xTags library.
Library.Definition.Description: Defines default xTags for different UI interactions. Some of them they are bound to a remote services at MSD (like login), but they can be overrided and customized.

Text.p: At the moment this library defines an early support of the login services, connected to the login REST service.

Library.Example.Title: How to use the default library

Description.p: The default library is meant to be used automatically, and not linked or invoked directly.

Code.data: xtag.Login(); // Will invoke the login UI from the default templates

Description.p: You can override this behavior by defining your own default UI:
Or you can define a specific one in a template you develop:

Code.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <Templates> <I.Am.A.Template xLogin="I.Am.A.Custom.Login.Template"> ... </I.Am.A.Template>
<I.Am.A.Custom.Login.Template> Custom login. Yuuuhhuuuuu! </I.Am.A.Custom.Login.Template> </Templates>
